Articles.Content: Lets say you put a bunch of claws with chutes onto an asteroid, steer it to a soft collision course to Kerbin and actually make it land safely. Can you recover it, and is it worth anything?
Not really. Just good for mining and science.
If you could land it close enough to base, is there a limit to how much you could mine it for money?

I remember reading that asteroids have a limit amount of ore, but I do not think it would be worth selling it, the logistics are quite expensive to get an asteroid down to Kerbin.

Btw.: Are asteroids still indestructable or do the crash/burn now?

> 
> I remember reading that asteroids have a limit amount of ore, but I do not think it would be worth selling it, the logistics are quite expensive to get an asteroid down to Kerbin.
> Btw.: Are asteroids still indestructable or do the crash/burn now?

They've always been destructable I believe, they just have huge tolerances.
